headline: Huntington Ingalls Industries (HII) is Unlocking Its Growth Potential
summary: Sound Shore Management, an investment management firm, has released its investor letter for the fourth quarter of 2025. You can download a copy of the report here. In Q4 2025, The Sound Shore Fund Investor Class (SSHFX) and Institutional Class (SSHVX) advanced 7.83% and 7.87%, respectively, compared to the S&P 500’s 2.66% return and the Russell […]
